item.title: Open Data Science Conference East
item.author: andrewrgoss@gmail.com (Andrew Goss)
item.description:
In May 2016 I attended my first Open Data Science Conference in Boston. There were some 3,000+ data science practioners that came together at the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center to share ideas about this rapidly changing discipline. The following topics were covered through the conference:

  • Deep Learning
  • Machine Learning
  • Predictive Analytics
  • Python
  • Stan
  • R
  • Julia
  • Hadoop
  • Spark
  • Scikit-learn
  • Natural Language Processing

The workshop materials from the conference are available on opendatascience.com.
